successes.title: The Peachy Printer - The First $100 3D Printer & Scanner!

Pledges.description: A  big thank-you for wanting to see this project succeed and your help is greatly appreciated!
A personalized thank-you email from the creators of the peachy printer and recognition on our website as a funder.
100ml of resin.  Don't be fooled!  Due to the Peachy's unique design you need very little resin to start printing!  100ml is enough to print many small objects!
Available in red, yellow, blue, green, purple, orange, black, and clear.
Get your hands on a Peachy Printer T-shirt!

One litre of resin.  Yes, that's right, a whole litre!
 This is the same awesome and extremely fast resin used in our video!  Available in red, yellow, blue, green, purple, orange, black, and clear.  Not only is it one of the cheapest resins available, it's also of the highest quality, and there is a story behind why!  Visit the Resin page on our website to find out more.

Early Bird Pricing on the Peachy Printer KIT!  This includes everything you need to build your own printer! The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children).  100ml of resin included.

Peachy Printer Kit!
This includes all the unique parts you need to build your own printer! The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children).  Includes 100ml of resin

Peachy Printer Kit!
This includes all the unique parts you need to build your own printer!  The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children).  100ml of resin included.

Peachy Printer Kit! This includes all the unique parts you need to build your own printer! The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children). 100ml of resin included.

Peachy Printer Kit! This includes all the unique parts you need to build your own printer! The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children). 100ml of resin included.

Peachy Printer Kit! This includes the printer housing, it's components, and the drip system!  You must supply your own liquid reservoirs and mounting system (you can use household items, see FAQ).  You can also see our add ons section to make it a complete kit.  The estimated build time is only 1 hour (parental supervision will be required for children). 100ml of resin included.

Scanner attachment for the Peachy Printer which will include a quick release mount to the printer, HD camera and rotating platform that will be used for scanning smaller objects.  Please note that you are able to perform the scanning function with your own camera.
A fully assembled Peachy Printer.  Open it up and start printing within minutes!  500ml of resin included.
Become a Beta Tester!  This is your chance to help shape our final product.
You will receive an early pre-production kit with extra parts!  You will also get exclusive contact with our team to help us make the Peachy Printer even better with your experience and ideas!
Once we've finalize our product and are ready to ship to our other funders, we will send you a second kit.  So in total you will get two printers!
